ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Not sure, but here's my guess for the new 45th leve l song
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I am confused now...I recently attended a guild wedding at the Shadowed men monument in LFAY. Amid the fighting appeared an /anon bard who sang, A
ygData.messageBody:
--- John_Senior@... wrote:
> Does it last a pathetic amount of time like the last
> charm song? Or does it
> stick for longer now? This was one thing that
> annoyed me about our charm
> song, the fact that it only lasts a few seconds you
> feel like you don't
> have enough power over the mob you are charming.

I am confused now...I recently attended a guild
wedding at the Shadowed men monument in LFAY.

Amid the fighting appeared an /anon bard who sang, "A
shadowed man's eyes glaze over"

He then had great sport ordering it about..."Sit down
you stupid lout!" and it responded "Sitting master"

What has me confused is this charm lasted easily
longer than 30 seconds...was this unusual or are we
talking about something different?
